name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Jerry MARSHALL, Jr., Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and GREENSPAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Jerry MARSHALL, Jr., Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of January, 2009, the order of the PCRA court is hereby affirmed. See Commonwealth v. Fahy, 598 Pa. 584, 959 A.2d 312 (2008) and Commonwealth v. Marshall, 596 Pa. 587, 947 A.2d 714 (2008).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David Lee Zuckerman, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for Jerry J. Marshall, Jr.
Hugh J. Burns, Esq., Amy Zapp, Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
962 A.2d 631
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Jerry MARSHALL, Jr., Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 21, 2009.
David Lee Zuckerman, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for Jerry J. Marshall, Jr.
Hugh J. Burns, Esq., Amy Zapp, Esq., Philadelphia District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and GREENSPAN, JJ.
